go_data.justification: SNAP-47 robustly interacts with BLOC-1, similar to SNAP-25.
The observed interactions between BLOC-1 and SNARE proteins provide a plausible mechanism by which BLOC-1 could regulate neurite outgrowth.
BLOC-1, syntaxin 13 and a small pool of SNAP-25 have been localized to endosomes, at least in certain cell types, and SNAP-47 is a SNARE protein similar to SNAP-25.
